tool.name: loc2newbkp
tool.displayname: Create New Backups for Track Points and Lines

param.name: web_pts
param.displayname: Source Track Points Feature Service Layer

param.name: loc_pts_new
param.displayname: Backup Track Points Feature Class (to create)
param.dialogReference: New backup feature class for track points.

param.name: lines_new
param.dialogReference: New backup feature class for track lines, generated from points with adequate location accuracy only.

param.name: break
param.dialogReference: Time duration used to define breaks between track lines. If the gap between successive points with the same session_id is greater than this, a new track line will be created.

tool.summary: Copies data from an existing track points feature service layer to a new feature class. Points are attributed with a 'use' column, indicating if they should be used to generate track lines. Lines are then generated from these points. These layers (or feature services generated from them) can then be used as the backup layer inputs to the 'Update Backups of Track Points and Track Lines' tool.

idCitation.resTitle: Create New Backups for Track Points and Lines
